alerts.selectNumberField: Retrieve all posts containing a specific hashtag from an Instagram user and write the data back to the current data table.
alerts.error: !!! Do not use this plugin too frequently, as it may lead to your account being detected by Instagram's official detection system.

placeholder.cookie: Please fill in the IG Cookie according to the documentation.
placeholder.appId: Please fill in the IG X-Ig-App-ID according to the documentation.
placeholder.claim: Please fill in the IG X-Ig-Www-Claim according to the documentation.
placeholder.hashtag: Please enter the hashtag to filter posts, e.g., #spring.
placeholder.username: Please enter the target username, e.g., lakeandmonster.
placeholder.userFieldId: Please select the username field in the user table. Note that the field type should be text.
placeholder.outputTableId: Please select the output table for post data.

infoTip.end_sentence: uploaderNum users posted a total of postTotalNum posts, of which postNumFilteredHashtag posts contain the specified hashtag. Time taken: time.

errorTip.empty_headers: Please fill in the necessary Headers information.
errorTip.empty_params: Please fill in the necessary Params information.
errorTip.empty_response_fields_selected: Please check the fields information to be returned.
errorTip.empty_input: Please fill in the necessary form information.
